fields.doc: Timestamp when the Kafka message was created.
fields.name: kafka_timestamp

fields.doc: Hexadecimal character string holding the checksum of the file
fields.name: checksum

fields.doc: Name of the package which generated the file being announced
fields.name: generator

fields.doc: Mime Type code for the file
fields.name: mimeType

fields.doc:
A Uniform Resource Locator which links to a Large File Object
either for ingest into the EFD Large File Annex, or to announce
the successful copy of same to the EFD Large File Annex.
Protocols are those supported by the cURL library.
fields.name: url

fields.doc: A dotted x.y version number denoting the file format revision
fields.name: version
